title.rendered: SSHS Seniors Receive Community Service Awards

content.rendered:
Congratulations to SSHS Seniors Ryan McPhee and Kate Thompson. This week, Ryan was awarded the Saratoga County School Board Association Community Service Award and Kate was awarded the Adirondack Area School Boards Association Community Service Award. 

Ryan and Kate have been dedicated student representatives at this year’s Board of Education meetings.
